file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 33-50-12-02 - CONFIG-2 - FLOOR PROXIMITY STRIP LIGHTS - MAINTENANCE PRACTICES

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL FLOOR PROXIMITY STRIP LIGHTS - MAINTENANCE PRACTICES EFFECTIVITY: ACFT MODEL(S) EMB-135 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to discard the Photoluminescent Floor-Proximity Strip Lights. B. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY FOR AIRCRAFT WITH PHOTOLUMINESCENT PHOTOLUMINESCENT FLOOR-PROXIMI- 33-50-12-900-801-A FLOOR-PROXIMITY TY STRIP LIGHTS - DISPOSAL STRIP LIGHTS EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General CONFIG-2 33-50-12 Page 1 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 33-50-12-900-801-A EFFECTIVITY: FOR AIRCRAFT WITH PHOTOLUMINESCENT FLOOR-PROXIMITY STRIP LIGHTS 2. PHOTOLUMINESCENT FLOOR-PROXIMITY STRIP LIGHTS - DISPOSAL A. General (1) This task gives the procedures to discard the Photoluminescent Floor-Proximity Strip Lights. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM TASK 33-50-12-000-802-A/400 - AMM TASK 33-50-12-400-802-A/400 - C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 231 Passenger cabin 241 Passenger cabin 242 Passenger cabin 251 Passenger cabin 252 Passenger cabin 261 Passenger cabin 262 Passenger cabin D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Passenger cabin I. Photoluminescent Floor-Proximity Strip Lights - Disposal (Figure 201) SUBTASK 960-003-A EFFECTIVITY: FOR AIRCRAFT WITH PHOTOLUMINESCENT FLOOR-PROXIMITY STRIP LIGHTS (1) Discard the Photoluminescent Floor-Proximity Strip Light as follows: EMB-145 - AMM 1285 900-801-A/200 CONFIG-2 33-50-12 Page 2 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (a) Remove and discard all the Photoluminescent Floor-Proximity Strip Lights. Refer to AMM TASK 33-50-12-000-802-A/400. (b) Install the new Photoluminescent Floor-Proximity Strip Lights. Refer to AMM TASK 33-50-12-400-802-A/400. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 900-801-A/200 CONFIG-2 33-50-12 Page 3 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
